publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-341 David McLetchie: Road Tollsâ€”That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to reject any congestion charging scheme submitted to it by the City of Edinburgh Council for approval which requires people living in Balerno, Currie, Juniper Green, South Queensferry, Kirkliston and other areas within the city boundary but beyond the City Bypass to pay a toll to enter their own city. Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-341 Road Tolls (lodged on 12 September 2003) Phil Gallie*, John Swinburne*
S2M-341 Road Tolls (lodged on 12 September 2003) Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-341 Road Tolls (lodged on 12 September 2003) John Scott*
